summary: REQ-3/4/5 appear to be addressed via a more compact LiveCalendarWidget, a tightened Dashboard header block, and a global minimalist styling pass (utility classes + updated page layouts + denser BottomNav). However, the diff summary also indicates substantial unrelated additions/changes (AI integrations, expanded exercise/nutrition databases, and store changes) that were not requested by the BuildRequest and may violate the scope/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded DeepSeek AI integrations for calorie calculation and nutrition fetching (smart backend-style behavior) which is outside the requested minimalist UI refinement and conflicts with the stated non-goal of backend/data-persistence changes related to the calendar widget.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for UI/UX compaction and styling (calendar/header/pages/nav) and explicitly lists backend changes as non-goals; AI API integrations are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded large exercise and nutrition databases/modules (Mevsa exhaustive exercise library; Indian brand nutrition database).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-3/4/5 (which are strictly minimalist styling/layout changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Significant Zustand store enhancements (gym tracking changes, workflow changes) beyond the requested styling pass.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 is about consistent typography/spacing/borders/card density; functional state/model changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder hook file (useQueries.ts).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements (REQ-3/4/5).
